tools.name: Castro
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh compressible astrophysics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: Castro is an adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code for astrophysical compressible hydrodynamics, supporting radiation and magnetohydrodynamics on CPU and GPU architectures.

tools.name: PeleLM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive mesh hydrodynamics for low Mach number reacting flows
tools.detailed_description: PeleLM is an adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) simulation code designed for low Mach number reacting flows, part of the AMReX-Combustion suite.

tools.name: IAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel adaptive mesh refinement code for incompressible Navier-Stokes
tools.detailed_description: IAMR is a parallel, adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code that solves the variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations.

tools.name: ARTEMIS

tools.name: DMF-TONN

tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing direct mesh-free topology optimization leveraging neural networks.

tools.name: SolidsPy

tools.name: implicit_filter

tools.name: femus

tools.name: TQMesh

tools.name: Vis2Mesh

tools.name: CraftsMan3D

tools.name: JAX-AMR

tools.name: ntopo

tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for performing topology optimization without explicit meshing, utilizing neural representations (neural fields) to define geometry and material distribution. It targets structural optimization problems.

tools.name: Gmsh.jl

tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting high-quality textured meshes from Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) using adaptive surface refinement, bridging neural rendering and explicit mesh representations.

tools.name: neuro-voxel

tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing and analyzing volumetric MRI data, specifically converting NIfTI slices to 3D meshes using Marching Cubes, designed for medical imaging research.

tools.name: MMGR
tools.one_line_profile: Geographic mapping with unsupervised multi-modal representation learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for geographic mapping using unsupervised multi-modal representation learning from VHR images and POIs, for remote sensing applications.

tools.name: PoissonSamplingGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Poisson-like distribution generator for sampling
tools.detailed_description: A generator for Poisson-disk and other sampling distributions, useful in rendering, particle seeding for CFD, and mesh point generation.

tools.name: smeshing
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh generator for unstructured triangular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based mesh generator for creating unstructured triangular grids, suitable for finite element or finite volume simulations.

tools.name: cutcell
tools.one_line_profile: Cartesian cut cell grid generator
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for generating Cartesian cut cell grids, a technique used in CFD to handle complex boundaries on structured grids.

tools.name: gpu-amr
tools.one_line_profile: GPU Adaptive Mesh Refinement for CFD applications
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated implementation of adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) specifically designed for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) applications to enhance performance.

tools.name: CFD-Simulation-in-Porous-Medium
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB workflow for CFD simulation in porous media
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based workflow for simulating flows through porous materials, including geometry import, mesh generation, and CFD simulation.

tools.name: geovista
tools.one_line_profile: Cartographic rendering and mesh analytics powered by PyVista
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for cartographic rendering and mesh analytics, extending PyVista to handle geo-located data and unstructured meshes commonly used in earth sciences.

tools.name: MeshAnything
tools.one_line_profile: Artist-Created Mesh Generation with Autoregressive Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI model and library capable of generating high-quality 3D meshes from various inputs, mimicking human artistic topology.

tools.name: MeshAnythingV2

tools.detailed_description: The second version of MeshAnything, improving mesh generation quality and efficiency using adjacent mesh tokenization techniques.

tools.name: gmsh2ccx

tools.detailed_description: A converter tool that translates mesh files from Gmsh format to CalculiX input format, facilitating the workflow between meshing and FEA solving.

tools.name: pygccx

tools.detailed_description: A Python framework to build, solve, and postprocess finite element models using Gmsh for meshing and CalculiX for solving.

tools.name: unv2ccx

tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert UNV mesh files (typically from Salome) to the CalculiX INP format for finite element analysis.

tools.name: rodin
tools.one_line_profile: Modern C++20 finite element method and shape optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A C++20 framework for finite element analysis and shape optimization, providing modern interfaces for solving PDEs and optimizing geometries.

tools.name: p4est
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable algorithms for parallel adaptive mesh refinement on forests of octrees
tools.detailed_description: A C library for dynamic management of a collection (forest) of octrees, enabling parallel adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) for PDE solvers.

tools.name: scida
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable analysis tool for large scientific datasets (astrophysics)
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for analyzing large scientific datasets, particularly cosmological and galaxy formation simulations, leveraging Dask for scalability.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool to generate 2D meshes around airfoils
tools.detailed_description: A Python script/tool that interfaces with Gmsh to automatically generate 2D structured or unstructured meshes around airfoil geometries for CFD.

tools.name: PyAero
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil contour analysis and CFD meshing tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for analyzing airfoil contours and generating 2D meshes for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) applications.

tools.name: mesh-sphere-packing
tools.one_line_profile: Tetrahedral mesh generator from sphere packings
tools.detailed_description: A mesh generator that produces tetrahedral meshes with periodic boundaries derived from packings of spheres, useful for porous media or granular material simulations.

tools.name: SDFGen
tools.one_line_profile: Signed Distance Field generator from triangle meshes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility to generate grid-based signed distance fields (level sets) from 3D triangle meshes, widely used in physics simulations (fluids, collisions).

tools.name: CADMesh
tools.one_line_profile: CAD file interface for GEANT4
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows loading CAD models (PLY, STL, OBJ) directly into GEANT4 geometry for particle physics simulations.

tools.name: salome_cfd_extensions
tools.one_line_profile: SALOME platform modules and extensions for CFD
tools.detailed_description: Extensions and modules for the SALOME platform, specifically tailored for CFD workflows involving Code_Saturne, developed by EDF.

tools.name: 2D-Elliptic-Mesh-Generator
tools.one_line_profile: 2D orthogonal elliptic mesh generator solving Winslow PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for generating 2D orthogonal elliptic meshes by solving the Winslow partial differential equations.

tools.name: voxel2mesh
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Mesh Model Generation from Volumetric Data
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating 3D meshes directly from volumetric data (e.g., MRI/CT), bypassing traditional iso-surfacing steps.

tools.name: classy_blocks

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a high-level, object-oriented interface for creating complex blockMesh dictionaries for OpenFOAM, simplifying structured mesh generation.

tools.name: 2D_CARFIVE

tools.detailed_description: A Fortran solver implementing 2D Cartesian Quadtree Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) for the multiphase Five Equations Model in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: QTAdaptive

tools.name: jigsaw

tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and command-line tool for generating high-quality unstructured triangular and tetrahedral meshes using Delaunay refinement.

tools.name: jigsaw-geo-matlab

tools.detailed_description: MATLAB interface for JIGSAW(GEO), enabling the generation of unstructured meshes for geoscientific modelling within MATLAB.

tools.name: jigsaw-geo-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for JIGSAW(GEO) mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: Python interface for JIGSAW(GEO), enabling the generation of unstructured meshes for geoscientific modelling within Python.

tools.name: jigsaw-matlab

tools.detailed_description: MATLAB interface for the JIGSAW mesh generator, facilitating Delaunay-based unstructured meshing in MATLAB workflows.

tools.name: jigsaw-python

tools.detailed_description: Python interface for the JIGSAW mesh generator, facilitating Delaunay-based unstructured meshing in Python workflows.

tools.name: NGA2

tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates volume meshes from surface meshes using hyperbolic marching methods, developed by MDO Lab.

tools.name: optimesh
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh optimization and smoothing tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for mesh optimization and smoothing, implementing various algorithms like Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation (CVT) and Optimal Delaunay Triangulation (ODT).

tools.name: MFEM
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight, general, scalable C++ library for finite element methods
tools.detailed_description: MFEM is a modular parallel C++ library for finite element methods. It features arbitrary high-order finite element meshes and spaces, support for a wide variety of discretization methods, and parallel scalability.

tools.name: ship_mmg
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based simulator for ship maneuvering based on the MMG model
tools.detailed_description: A simulator implementing the Maneuvering Modeling Group (MMG) model for predicting ship maneuverability. It provides a web-based interface for running simulations based on hydrodynamic coefficients.

tools.name: cinolib
tools.one_line_profile: A generic programming header-only C++ library for processing polygonal and polyhedral meshes
tools.detailed_description: Cinolib is a C++ library for processing surface and volumetric meshes. It supports various mesh types (trimesh, quadmesh, tetmesh, hexmesh, etc.) and provides algorithms for geometry processing, making it suitable for pre-processing in simulations.

tools.name: HAMeRS
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamics Adaptive Mesh Refinement Simulator for compressible flows
tools.detailed_description: HAMeRS is a simulator for compressible multi-species/multi-phase simulations utilizing adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) techniques to resolve flow features efficiently.

tools.name: p3d2gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from NASA's Plot3D mesh format to Gmsh's MSH format
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert computational grids in NASA's Plot3D format (commonly used in CFD) into the Gmsh MSH format, facilitating interoperability between mesh generators and solvers.

tools.name: pyrefine
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripting interface for CFD mesh adaptation with refine
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface developed by NASA for 'refine', a mesh adaptation tool. It allows for scripting and automation of mesh adaptation processes in computational fluid dynamics workflows.

tools.name: SOLVERLAB
tools.one_line_profile: PDE solver lab using SALOME/MEDCoupling meshes and PETSc matrices
tools.detailed_description: SOLVERLAB is a development environment for Partial Differential Equation (PDE) solvers. It integrates mesh management via SALOME/MEDCoupling and linear algebra via PETSc, providing a framework for scientific computing.

tools.name: Neper
tools.one_line_profile: Software for polycrystal generation and meshing
tools.detailed_description: Neper is a software package for generating and meshing polycrystals. It can generate synthetic microstructures with specific statistical properties and create high-quality meshes for finite element analysis.

tools.name: nii2mesh
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert NIfTI medical volumes to triangulated meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C utility that converts NIfTI volume data (commonly used in medical imaging) into triangulated meshes (OBJ, STL, etc.) using the marching cubes algorithm, facilitating the use of medical data in simulation and visualization.

tools.name: GradientAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) criteria for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library and set of examples for OpenFOAM that implements Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) strategies based on the gradient of flow variables, improving simulation efficiency by refining meshes only where necessary.

tools.name: salomeToOpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Salome mesh format to OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A Python script designed to bridge the gap between the Salome platform (pre-processing/meshing) and OpenFOAM (CFD solver) by converting mesh files, facilitating the workflow between these two open-source scientific tools.

tools.name: volume_distribution
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for distributing 3D vectors inside a mesh
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating distributions of 3D vectors within a mesh volume, useful for particle seeding, initial condition generation, or sampling in scientific simulations.

tools.name: mmgdynamics
tools.one_line_profile: MMG Standard model for ship maneuvering simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the MMG (Manoeuvring Modelling Group) standard model for simulating ship maneuvering dynamics, including extensions for environmental factors like currents, winds, and shallow water.

tools.name: discretization-robust-correspondence-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for 3D ML models across surface remeshing
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and dataset designed to evaluate the robustness of 3D machine learning models against different surface discretizations and remeshing, aiding in the development of geometry-aware AI models.

tools.name: Gmsh.Net
tools.one_line_profile: .NET wrapper for the Gmsh mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper for the Gmsh library, enabling .NET developers to utilize Gmsh's powerful finite element mesh generation capabilities within their scientific or engineering applications.

tools.name: pygmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A popular Python library that provides a pythonic interface to Gmsh, allowing users to generate complex finite element meshes using Python scripts, widely used in scientific computing workflows.

tools.name: LLaMA-Mesh
tools.one_line_profile: Unified 3D Mesh Generation with Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A research tool that adapts Large Language Models (LLMs) for 3D mesh generation, enabling the synthesis of 3D geometry from text prompts, bridging the gap between NLP and 3D scientific visualization/modeling.

tools.name: MMGX
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Molecular Graph eXplainable Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular discovery using graph-based explainable AI methods, assisting researchers in understanding molecular properties and structures through graph representations.

tools.name: Cassiopee
tools.one_line_profile: CFD pre- and post-processing Python modules by ONERA
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library developed by ONERA for CFD pre- and post-processing, including mesh manipulation, CGNS tree handling, and data extraction, tailored for aerospace research.

tools.name: FreeTO
tools.one_line_profile: Freeform 3D topology optimization in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for 3D topology optimization using structured meshes, allowing for the generation of smooth boundaries in structural design and physics simulations.

tools.name: MMGeneration
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generative models based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A powerful toolkit from OpenMMLab for generative models (GANs, Diffusion, etc.), widely used in AI research for image synthesis and data augmentation, applicable to scientific data generation tasks.

tools.name: bitpit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source C++ library for scientific HPC
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for high-performance computing in scientific applications, providing modules for mesh handling (octree, unstructured), parallel communication, and geometric operations, developed by Optimad.

tools.name: Surface-Remesher
tools.one_line_profile: Surface remeshing using Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for high-quality surface remeshing based on Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation (CVT), useful for improving mesh quality in geometry processing and simulation workflows.

tools.name: Dendro-GR
tools.one_line_profile: Highly scalable adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) framework for numerical relativity
tools.detailed_description: Dendro-GR is a framework for high-performance computational physics, specifically designed for numerical relativity. It utilizes octree-based wavelet adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) to solve Einstein's equations efficiently on large-scale supercomputers.

tools.name: AirfoilMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Glyph script for generating NACA airfoil geometries and meshes in Pointwise
tools.detailed_description: A specialized script for the Pointwise meshing software that automates the generation of NACA 4-series airfoil geometries and their associated boundary layer meshes, facilitating aerodynamic CFD simulations.

tools.name: VSP2CFD
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh converter from OpenVSP surface meshes to Pointwise volume meshes
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that bridges NASA's OpenVSP geometry tool and Pointwise meshing software, allowing users to generate high-quality volume meshes for CFD from OpenVSP surface models.

tools.name: CFDTool
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for CFD simulations with OpenFOAM and SU2 integration
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) toolbox that provides an easy-to-use interface for geometry modeling, mesh generation, and solving fluid flow and heat transfer problems, integrating with solvers like OpenFOAM and SU2.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Fully integrated multiphysics simulation platform for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive physics simulation toolbox for MATLAB that integrates Finite Element Analysis (FEA) with support for external solvers like FEniCS, OpenFOAM, and SU2. It covers the entire workflow from geometry and meshing to solving and post-processing.

tools.name: pyacvd
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of ACVD surface mesh resampling algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a wrapper around the ACVD (Approximated Centroidal Voronoi Diagrams) algorithm for uniform resampling of surface meshes, essential for improving mesh quality in scientific computing and visualization.

tools.name: scikit-gmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Gmsh to generate 3D finite element meshes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a scikit-style interface to the Gmsh mesh generator, allowing users to define geometries and generate 3D finite element meshes programmatically within Python workflows.

tools.name: tetgen (Python)
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to the C++ TetGen library for tetrahedral meshing
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the robust C++ TetGen library, enabling the generation of tetrahedral meshes from 3D polyhedral domains. It is widely used in scientific computing for creating volumetric meshes from surface data.

tools.name: CfdOF
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: An extension workbench for FreeCAD that integrates OpenFOAM and Fenics solvers, providing a GUI for setting up, meshing (using Gmsh/Netgen), and running CFD simulations directly within the CAD environment.

tools.name: RAMSES
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) code for astrophysics and hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source code for astrophysical simulations, employing Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) to solve hydrodynamics and magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) equations with high resolution in regions of interest.

tools.name: gmsh_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Script-based 3D mesh generator using curved cuboid elements
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts leveraging Gmsh to generate mixed structured/unstructured 3D meshes based on curved cuboid primitives, useful for specific finite element analysis setups.

tools.name: PostMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Curvilinear mesh generator for high-order finite element analysis
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and tool designed to generate high-order curvilinear meshes, which are essential for high-fidelity finite element simulations requiring accurate geometric representation.

tools.name: Florence
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based finite element framework for multiphysics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive finite element framework in Python that includes capabilities for arbitrary order planar and curvilinear mesh generation, as well as solvers for linear and nonlinear coupled multiphysics problems.

tools.name: gridgen-c
tools.one_line_profile: Orthogonal multi-corner grid generator
tools.detailed_description: A C library and utility for generating orthogonal grids, particularly useful for oceanography and fluid dynamics simulations requiring specific grid topologies.

tools.name: Project-FEA
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible Finite Element Library for custom weak forms
tools.detailed_description: A C++ Finite Element library designed for flexibility, allowing users to easily define and solve new weak forms for various physical models.

tools.name: Gmsh (Mirror)
tools.one_line_profile: 3D finite element mesh generator with pre- and post-processing facilities
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source 3D finite element mesh generator with a built-in CAD engine and post-processor. (Note: This appears to be a GitHub mirror of the official GitLab repository).

tools.name: blendmsh
tools.one_line_profile: Interface bridge between Blender and Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that acts as a bridge between the Blender 3D creation suite and the Gmsh mesh generator, allowing users to leverage Blender's modeling capabilities for FEA mesh generation.

tools.name: overlap
tools.one_line_profile: Library for exact calculation of overlap volume between spheres and mesh elements
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library that provides exact analytical calculations for the overlap volume and area between spheres and mesh elements, useful for particle-mesh coupling and geometric analysis in simulations.

tools.name: meshwell
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for meshing 2D/3D polygon collections with GMSH
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that simplifies the process of meshing collections of 2D and 3D polygons, including complex extrusions, by interfacing with GMSH. It is particularly useful for device simulation and photonics.

tools.name: TMR
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel semi-structured quadtree and octree mesh generation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for parallel generation of semi-structured quadtree and octree meshes, featuring specialized tools for topology optimization and large-scale design problems.

tools.name: pycalculix
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to automate FEA model building and meshing in Calculix
tools.detailed_description: A Python 3 library that automates the creation and building of finite element analysis (FEA) models for the Calculix solver, supporting meshing via Calculix or GMSH.

tools.name: stellarmesh
tools.one_line_profile: Meshing library tailored for nuclear engineering workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based meshing library specifically designed to support nuclear engineering simulation workflows, facilitating geometry processing and mesh generation.

tools.name: LaB-GATr
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Algebra Transformers for biomedical surface and volume meshes
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Algebra Transformers (GATr) optimized for processing large biomedical surface and volume meshes, enabling geometric deep learning on scientific data.

tools.name: L0Denoising
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh denoising tool using L0 optimization
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the 'Mesh Denoising via L0 Optimization' algorithm, providing a tool for removing noise from 3D meshes while preserving features.

tools.name: Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: DG FEM Runge-Kutta solver for hyperbolic systems
tools.detailed_description: A Discontinuous Galerkin Finite Element Method (DG-FEM) solver using Runge-Kutta time stepping, designed for hyperbolic systems of equations such as shallow water equations.

tools.name: SnappyHexMesh GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Blender add-on providing a GUI for OpenFOAM's snappyHexMesh
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that serves as a graphical user interface for OpenFOAM's snappyHexMesh, facilitating the definition and export of mesh generation parameters directly from Blender.

tools.name: Unstructured Grids
tools.one_line_profile: Blender add-on for importing and visualizing 3D volume meshes
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on enabling the import, visualization, and manipulation of unstructured 3D volume grids (meshes), supporting scientific visualization workflows within Blender.

tools.name: GNN-Surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based surrogate model for unstructured-mesh ocean simulations
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical and adaptive Graph Neural Network (GNN) framework designed as a surrogate model for parameter space exploration in unstructured-mesh ocean simulations.

tools.name: SMESH
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone mesh module from the Salome Platform
tools.detailed_description: The extracted Mesh module from the Salome Platform, providing a comprehensive C++ library for mesh generation, editing, and management.

tools.name: GDS3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D rendering and mesh generation from IC GDSII layout files
tools.detailed_description: A tool that interprets GDSII IC layout files to render them in 3D and export 3D models for meshing (e.g., GMSH), bridging electronics design and physical simulation.

tools.name: HOHQMesh
tools.one_line_profile: High Order Hex-Quad Mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A package to automatically generate all-quadrilateral meshes with high-order boundary information, suitable for high-order finite element simulations.

tools.name: P4est.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the p4est adaptive mesh refinement library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Julia wrapper for the p4est C library, enabling the management of multiple connected adaptive quadtrees/octrees in parallel for scientific simulations.

tools.name: City4CFD
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction of LoD2 3D city models for urban flow simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to reconstruct Level of Detail 2 (LoD2) 3D city models specifically for use in urban Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) flow simulations.

tools.name: TetGen
tools.one_line_profile: Quality Tetrahedral Mesh Generator and 3D Delaunay Triangulator
tools.detailed_description: A robust and widely used tool for generating quality tetrahedral meshes and 3D Delaunay triangulations, essential for finite element and finite volume methods.

tools.name: Cahn-Hilliard Solver
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation code for the Cahn-Hilliard equation
tools.detailed_description: A solver implementation for simulating the Cahn-Hilliard equation, which describes the process of phase separation.

tools.name: FEconv
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh and finite element field format converter with bandwidth optimization
tools.detailed_description: A utility program to convert between several mesh and FE field formats (ANSYS, Nastran, VTK, etc.) and transform finite element types. It also includes bandwidth optimization capabilities using the Cuthill-McKee algorithm.

tools.name: umeshu
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight 2D unstructured mesh generation library
tools.detailed_description: A simple C++ library for generating unstructured meshes in 2-D using Delaunay refinement algorithms. It is designed to be light-weight and easy to integrate for planar mesh generation tasks.

tools.name: Pixel2Mesh++
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view 3D mesh generation framework via deformation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Pixel2Mesh++ algorithm which generates high-quality 3D meshes from multi-view images through a deformation-based approach. It serves as a tool for AI-driven geometry reconstruction and mesh generation.

tools.name: fast-envelope
tools.one_line_profile: Exact and efficient polyhedral envelope containment check library
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an algorithm for exact and efficient polyhedral envelope containment checks. It conservatively predicts if a triangle is within a given distance to a triangular mesh, useful for geometry processing and collision handling.

tools.name: PartCrafter
tools.one_line_profile: Structured 3D mesh generation via latent diffusion transformers
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art generative model for creating structured 3D meshes using compositional latent diffusion transformers. It enables high-quality generation of 3D geometries suitable for downstream scientific or engineering applications.

tools.name: PivotMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Generic 3D mesh generation via pivot vertices guidance
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of PivotMesh, a method for generating generic 3D meshes guided by pivot vertices. It provides a data-driven approach to mesh synthesis and geometry creation.

tools.name: fTetWild
tools.one_line_profile: Robust and fast tetrahedral meshing for wild geometry
tools.detailed_description: A robust tetrahedral meshing algorithm designed to handle 'wild' unstructured geometry. It automatically generates tetrahedral meshes from triangle soups or imperfect surface meshes, widely used in simulation and geometry processing.

tools.name: cfMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Library for automated mesh generation in CFD workflows
tools.detailed_description: A library for mesh generation built on top of OpenFOAM, designed to simplify the meshing process for CFD simulations. It supports various meshing workflows and is a mirror/fork of the original cfMesh tools.

tools.name: MMGDreamer
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-controllable 3D indoor scene generation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for generating 3D indoor scenes with geometry control using a mixed-modality graph approach. It allows for the synthesis of complex 3D environments, relevant for geometric modeling and simulation environments.

tools.name: pystella
tools.one_line_profile: Code generator for grid-based PDE solving on CPUs and GPUs
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based code generator designed to facilitate grid-based Partial Differential Equation (PDE) solving. It automates the creation of solver code optimized for both CPUs and GPUs, streamlining the simulation development process.

tools.name: Mesh2Volume
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting mesh to signed distance field (SDF) volume
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for converting 3D triangular meshes into Signed Distance Field (SDF) volumes. This conversion is essential for various physics simulations, collision detection, and volumetric modeling tasks.
